positions.title: Mid-Level Frontend Developer
bullets: Worked in React/Remix under collaboration with UX designer and manager to build web application enhancements and features.
Utilized Tailwind CSS for efficient and maintainable styling.
Used Drizzle ORM to communicate with backend services.
Leveraged AI tools to enhance coding efficiency and problem-solving capabilities.
Acquired proficiency in TypeScript to enhance the robustness and maintainability of the React/Remix application.

positions.title: Software Developer Apprentice
bullets: Assisted in transferring internal site from Angular to Vue
Created page to upload multiple photos, select/deselect, delete, and re-order photos by dragging
Used Chrome dev tools to compare page performance before and after code changes
Updated main site to order search results by newest listing instead of by price
Pair programming with other apprentice on work tickets
Gave presentation to management on HTTP requests using fetch and axios
Worked with team on tracking issues and site improvements

positions.title: Actuarial Analyst Assistant
bullets: Developed the model to analyze and present competitor Individual and Small Group rates
Model improvements to track and project monthly reinsurance estimates
Ad hoc model and data requests

positions.title: Underwriter III, Large Group
bullets: Developed models and templates to improve efficiency of rating process
Uses actuarial models to analyze medical risk
Evaluates group risk and attaches appropriate insurance rate

positions.title: Contingent Worker with Client Entity Management
bullets: Performed due diligence and entity research
Data analysis and quality control

groupProjects.name: Booklist App, FreeCodeCamp
bullets: Helped a local meetup chapter design and create an app for tracking books using Vue/Quasar
Coordinated efforts via GitHub
